parameters.name: CertRegion
parameters.description:
The region of the certificate. Valid values:

*   **ap-southeast-1**: Singapore
*   **cn-hangzhou**: China (Hangzhou)

Default value: **cn-hangzhou**

parameters.name: CertType
parameters.description:
The type of the certificate.

*   **upload**: a user-uploaded SSL certificate.
*   **cas**: a certificate that is acquired through Certificate Management Service.

parameters.name: Env
parameters.description: Specifies whether the certificate is issued in canary releases. If you set this parameter to **staging**, the certificate is issued in canary releases. If you do not specify this parameter or set this parameter to other values, the certificate is officially issued.

parameters.name: SSLPri
parameters.description: The private key. This parameter is required only if you enable the certificate.

parameters.name: SSLProtocol
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the SSL certificate. Default value: off. Valid values:

*   **on**
*   **off**

parameters.name: SSLPub
parameters.description: The content of the certificate. This parameter is required only if you enable the SSL certificate.
